channel.title: Ban Birthday topics
channel.description: They are merely spam, and they annoy me really much. If you want congratulate someone, be a man and don't. (Or talk to him/her privately)

item.title: Ban Birthday topics
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

FastBawlz:

I never get birthday topics D:

I’m sorry, I didn’t know. I’ll gift you something on Steam, it’ll be a surprise.

Read full topic

item.title: Ban Birthday topics
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Well, considering the General Section is the second largest board on this website with over 101k posts, and that there are several threads in the top 10 on this site in views and posts that are in the General Section alone, I think we can safely say it is already mostly spam. Banning birthday topics because of spam seems like an entire contradiction to everything you do anyway. Imo, they do no one any harm and there is no legitimate reason why they should be taken off. I say keep 'em.

Read full topic

item.title: Ban Birthday topics
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

[quote=“sanga282, post:29, topic:224294”][quote author=magma828 link=topic=294653.msg2375745#msg2375745 date=1218398407]
Why is everyone so angry about spam unless it’s by some legendary elite member?
[/quote]

Spam anyone?

Please. Then this section would have far less spam, and stop people complaining. Imo, spam isn’t spam if you arn’t forced to look at it. It’s your own choice if you want to click on the spam board, whereas having to look at the general section cluttered with shit is forcing you.

Yeah you can also make it so that posts there do not contribute towards you post count[/quote]
Perfect.
Get right on it, Moppy.

Read full topic

item.title: Ban Birthday topics
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

On another topic

Why is everyone so angry about spam unless it’s by some legendary elite member?


Spam anyone?

On another topic

Please. Then this section would have far less spam, and stop people complaining. Imo, spam isn’t spam if you arn’t forced to look at it. It’s your own choice if you want to click on the spam board, whereas having to look at the general section cluttered with shit is forcing you.

Yeah you can also make it so that posts there do not contribute towards you post count

Read full topic

item.title: Ban Birthday topics
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

[quote=“Algas, post:27, topic:224294”]The Birthday board would be totally useless and would turn up into “spam all you like” board. There really isnt so many birthday topics to give them their own board and the subject is so flat. We could aswell give youtube links their own board since people are sometimes posting them.

Its really nice that you guys like to suggest new ideas there is nothing wrong in that but seriously… There will never be no birthday boards :D[/quote]
General Section #2.
ZOMG.

Make a spam board, then.
To post all the youtube links, birthdays, random pictures…

Genius.

Read full topic

item.title: Ban Birthday topics
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

[quote=“Kane., post:25, topic:224294”]I liked the idea of this “Birthday board”- although as previously stated there isn’t that many a month.
But, if there were a lot, the birthday board would work good.

It’d be active, i assume, and people would feel comfortable with posting more birthday topics in the know they won’t get flamed for spamming the general section or have people complain in site discussion.[/quote]
it would probably work and even if it wern’t that active it would me more active than than the neopets board.

Read full topic

item.title: Ban Birthday topics

But, if there were a lot, the birthday board would work good.

It’d be active, i assume, and people would feel comfortable with posting more birthday topics in the know they won’t get flamed for spamming the general section or have people complain in site discussion.

item.title: Ban Birthday topics

item.description:

[quote=“Speljohan, post:11, topic:224294”][quote author=Lothy link=topic=294653.msg2370039#msg2370039 date=1218174080]
I don’t see a problem with them. =\ It’s nice to wish someone a happy birthday.
[/quote]The problem i see is 500k idiots who don’t even know the person post “happy birthday :)”. I don’t know why but for some reason it annoys me as hell.[/quote]

They want to be special for posting it

Read full topic

item.title: Ban Birthday topics

I don’t see a problem with them. =\ It’s nice to wish someone a happy birthday.
[/quote]The problem i see is 500k idiots who don’t even know the person post “happy birthday :)”. I don’t know why but for some reason it annoys me as hell.[/quote]

item.title: Ban Birthday topics
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

I don’t see a real problem with them, its nice to wish someone a happy bday. Yeah it maybe spam but its not an overly big amount just lock them after the day is over so noobs dont carry on posting on it

Read full topic

item.title: Ban Birthday topics
item.dc:creator: @Tree Tree
item.description:
@Tree wrote:

[quote=“IP-Drowner, post:19, topic:224294”][quote author=Tree link=topic=294653.msg2371464#msg2371464 date=1218245243]

Its not as if we get loads of birthday topics, maybe 2 or 3 a month. I don’t see how two or three extra threads a month is realling making a difference.

I was under the impression there was more… If that’s the case, then i suppose there is no need. Though, they should be banned if there are 5-7 per month.
[/quote]
Who should be banned? The birthday thread makers or the person whos birthday it is? And why?[/quote]

The creation of birthday threads.
The reasons are clear if you would bother to read above.

Read full topic

item.title: Ban Birthday topics
item.dc:creator: @Tree Tree
item.description:
@Tree wrote:

I agree with Spel on this one. I’m tired of having to sort through massive amounts of spam just to find an interesting thread to read. The lucky birthday individuals are mention at the bottom… why create useless threads?

@Moparisthebest: It may not be a very large problem but there is no reason why you shouldn’t improve the forum and ban them.

Read full topic
